summary: SummaryBuxom Power-full Plump Lip Balm is a plumping and moisturizing tinted lip balm that blooms to your custom shade by reacting with the pH level of your lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsUnique reactor works with your individual pH level to transform lips to their most flattering custom shadeVisibly plumps for fuller-looking lipsSilky texture for a comfortable applicationWear it alone or layer with your favorite BUXOM lip productsKey IngredientsPumpkin Seed Oil: Helps to add comfort and supplenessPlumping peptides: Help to visibly plump lipsFormulated WithoutParabensPetroleumMineral OilItem 2557725How To UseApply shade Big O to lips liberally to reveal pH custom just-kissed tint of pink, which is meant to boost your lip's natural tone. Apply shade Dolly Fever to add a mauve flush to the lips. Wear alone or use as a prep before any like-tone lip application. Apply shade Inner Glow to add a nude flush to the lips. Wear alone or use as a prep before any like-tone lip application. Layer Power-full Plump to intensify tint based on your desire.Pro-Tip: Add a little color to the apples of the cheek for a balmy flush of color and to create color harmony on the face.IngredientsPentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Beeswax (Cera Alba/Cire D'Abeille), Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline), Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera/Cire Candelilla), Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Lactic Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Citric Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mica, Silica, Tin Oxide, Flavor (Aroma). May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 27 (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply shade Big O to lips liberally to reveal pH custom just-kissed tint of pink, which is meant to boost your lip's natural tone. Apply shade Dolly Fever to add a mauve flush to the lips. Wear alone or use as a prep before any like-tone lip application. Apply shade Inner Glow to add a nude flush to the lips. Wear alone or use as a prep before any like-tone lip application. Layer Power-full Plump to intensify tint based on your desire.Pro-Tip: Add a little color to the apples of the cheek for a balmy flush of color and to create color harmony on the face.

reviews.headline: I love this product.
reviews.comments: I have worn this product for several years.  Doesn't dry your lips out like some lipsticks do.  It does plump some.  I use it most everyday.  I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Not sticky slight color tint left my lips soft!

reviews.headline: yes and no
reviews.comments: I like how it felt & the non-stinging minty flavor but it settled into my lip lines

reviews.headline: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.comments: This product has actually exceeded my expectations. It's nothing fancy, but is a nice bridge between a plain lip balm and a lip gloss that provides color. I love the color the Big O changed to on my lips, it's a really gorgeous yet natural pink color. Provides a slight tingling sensation with a light plumping effect and feels moisturizingâ€¦. Whether it will ends up drying in the long run is yet to be determined. For now, I'd definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: My fav
reviews.comments: I use this every day and love it! Gives my lips a nice plump

reviews.headline: Would buy this again
reviews.comments: Goes on smooth and conditioning

reviews.headline: bummed
reviews.comments: I was really bummed with this product. I was so looking forward to this, I opened it up and it was broke off in the lid.

reviews.headline: Need to try in store
reviews.comments: I like this a lot but the color is not predictable. Even tho I got the "inner glow", once it adjusted to my lips, it looks bright coral pink like "first crush". Not thrilled with it I wanted more neutral. I will have to test and get a different color.

reviews.headline: BUY THIS!!
reviews.comments: this in the color "big o" is AMAZING! i dont know how but this makes my lips look so juicy. it has a slight sheer pink hue, its perfect for any look or season. seriously i reccomend this to everyone. the packing is really cute too

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I have been wearing dolly fevor for years. I love the color, and it goes on so smooth. Definitely plumps my lips. Has a little sting, but not so much, that it burns. The color last all night, even after eating. I get a lot of compliments when I wear it, and it's my very favorite, and I have tried many others over the years.

reviews.headline: I wear this literally every day
reviews.comments: I've worn Dolly Fever every day for yearssss. It's my go-to. The color is really pretty and lasts me pretty much all day, and it's pretty moisturizing. I usually wear it on top of chapstick for extra hydration though.

reviews.headline: Plumps and color!
reviews.comments: Plumps with a cool not burn! Love the color. Big O leaves lips pink and plump. Love that it's translucent vs other color options

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: I bought 3 of these. It did nothing its just like a chapstick. Too pricy for a lip balm.

reviews.headline: Doesn't work
reviews.comments: Although it's definitely moisturizing there is very little pigment and it doesn't change the plumpness of the lips.

reviews.headline: Moisture and colour
reviews.comments: Love it. I always keep one on hand.

reviews.headline: Not happy
reviews.comments: Arrived with the product stuck in the lid broken off from the base. I was able to get it out and I'm hoping that means it wasn't used and just poor packaging. The only good thing I can say is I like the color.

reviews.headline: Love the product!
reviews.comments: Love this product. Has a nice minty smell. Soes not smell like plastic to me. I bought the sheer color and feels like it brings out a nice pink color. I definitely want to try another color! It does bleed around the lips so you have to wioe it offâ€¦hard to tell with the sheer color.

reviews.headline: Aggressively pink but a great blush
reviews.comments: I've been using this in Big O for 2 years now and love this product more as a blush than a lip product. I'm very fair and don't usually opt for a bold lip, and this product seemed like a nice light pink, which it is for one swipe. If you reapply this it does get more and more pink. I saw myself after a night out of reapplication and felt like a kid who found their moms lipstick in the 80s. Its addicting to use though because the formula is fanastic, really smooth and a little minty. I've started to use this on my cheecks as a blush and blending it out with a brush and its gorgeous. It's a much better blush than lip product for my personal preference.

reviews.headline: Love this lip balm
reviews.comments: Love the way this feels on my lips. Also like the plumping feeling. I like the light pink shade Big O leaves on my lips. I wish there were more shades.

reviews.headline: never again
reviews.comments: sooooo mad! opened the container expected a pretty good sized amount of product--not only was thee hardly ANY product --just a small bump--it was broken off ! even on sale it's a rip off but broken when it's brand new? inexcusable

faceoff_positive.comments: I loved this product so much that as soon as I received my shipment I got online to buy 2 more. I see a lot of reviews saying it's "not true to color" or it turned their lips a certain color but the description clearly says " A unique reactor works with your individual PH level to transform your lips into your most flattering custom shade of pink." I actually loved the shade of pink it turned my lips because I wasn't expecting the pink you see on the applicator. This product gives a slight tingle sensation without being overbearing. I always like to have something on my lips so this is a great alternative to lipstick or chap stick and gives the right amount of slight pigment while looking natural.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I love the Buxom line of product and was really excited to try this. First of all, it's adorable. 
The pink tube color and packaging is so cute. It's like a giant tube of chap stick.
It's moisturizing and leaves a slight tingly feel. At first I liked the color it left but at times when I put it on it turns my lips a bright, 80's hot pink. Not cute. I expected it to be more subtle than that - a natural pink that plays off your natural coloring.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just ok - color can be weird.
